buildCommand: cd Onchainweb && npm install && npm run build

headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://vitals.vercel-insights.com https://vercel.live https://fonts.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.googleapis.com https://vitals.vercel-insights.com wss://*.walletconnect.com https://*.walletconnect.com https://api.web3modal.org https://pulse.walletconnect.org https://vercel.live; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
